name: Colour (DerKardo)
description:
You were the master of colours but you got thrown off your throne. You are fighting the main colours and fighting against their tyranny and to set you back on the top.

Every floor consists of only one colour (e.g. blue) and has one boss too.

This is a game made in the GMTK Gamejam 2019 with the theme Only One. Thats the reason why it is monochromatic.
